text: Georges Corvington, Jr. (6 November 1926 - 3 April 2013) was a Haitian historian.Haiti historian who chronicled capital dies at 88 , whig.com, 4 April 2013 He is best known for his seven-volume work on the history of Haiti's capital city, Port-au-Prince, entitled Port-au-Prince au Cours des Ans (Port-au-Prince Over The Years) (1743-1950). The book was published from 1970 to 1992. ==References== * Category:2013 deaths Category:1926 births Category:Haitian historians Category:Haitian male writers
title: Georges Corvington
